WorkItem.Description: The lists for the 2 slots are different (uniqueness doesn't account for this) and still don't show Tiny Abomination in a Jar. At least I can get my guy loaded without crashing now. Thank you for the hard work.

Comments.Message:
the lists are different because the other trinket you have equipped can significantly influence the best choice for the trinket.

If TaJ isn't there, you need to upload item upgrades from armory/wowhead.  It's listed, but currently still being undervalued.  Part of that is because of the item parser not using the right proc chance, and because there's currently no code in place to fully model everything TaJ can proc from.
btw... nothing has changed in 2.3.13 to cause it to not crash where it did before or vice versa...
